modName: Forties A Nords Dos And Donts Of Skyrim
summary:
A Collection of 5 Books that have formed from the Nexus Forum Post
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/930699-skyrim-good-idea-bad-idea/page-1
descriptionHtml:
[size=+2][color=Red][b]What Is This?[/b][/color][/size]
A Collection of 5 Books that have formed from the Nexus Forum Post
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/930699-skyrim-good-idea-bad-idea/page-1

These will be updated regularly as long as the post stays active.
There is a collection of 5(FIVE) books all added to the leveled list.
Just a fun mod more then anything. 

At the back of each book is a Thank You to each person who contributed.
Requires Only base game

[size=+2][color=Red][b]What Have You Done?[/b][/color][/size]
Added 5(FIVE) books into Skyrim called \"A Nords Do\'s And Dont\'s Of Skyrim\"
they are added to the leveled lists with common books so you can get them from level 1.
Or you can also type help Skyrim and should be one of the first books to appear.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Why?[/b][/color][/size]
Just for a quick fun mod, and to publish the Nexus Forum Post
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/930699-skyrim-good-idea-bad-idea/page-1

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Compatibility[/b][/color][/size]
With all current DLC\'S and future DLC\'s
Mods shouldn\'t inter fear with anything
[size=+2][color=Red][b]Thank You[/b][/color][/size]
SoulofChrysamere
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/2400849-soulofchrysamere/
for his original post on the Nexus Forums

AlduinWorldEater
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/5344147-alduinworldeater/
jonarus_drakus
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/979739-jonarus-drakus/
nyxalinth
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/472477-nyxalinth/
for contribution to this mod

[size=+4][color=Yellow][b]My Other Mods[/b][/color][/size]

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32103/
Forties Sheogorath Dawnguard Load Screens
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32305
Forties Alchemy Shack 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30448
author: Fortie
